column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello ?I S. - Thank you for your review and your kind words. As a franchise concept
column2: we are beholden to our corporate headquarters in regards to which ramen dishes we are allowed to serve. But you can always visit the company's website and submit a comment. They read all the correspondence that comes their way. Thank you again
column3: and we hope to serve you again soon.
